statements: SELECT product_name, historical_sales_data FROM product_demand_forecast;
SELECT * FROM product_demand_forecast ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, market_trends_data FROM product_demand_forecast WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_demand_forecast ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(jsonb_array_length(historical_sales_data)) AS avg_sales FROM product_demand_forecast;
SELECT * FROM product_demand_forecast WHERE product_id = 123;
SELECT product_name, market_trends_data->'region' AS market_region FROM product_demand_forecast WHERE product_id = 456;
SELECT product_id, avg(jsonb_array_elements_text(historical_sales_data->'sales')) AS avg_sales FROM product_demand_forecast GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM product_demand_forecast WHERE market_trends_data->'season' = 'Winter' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, jsonb_array_elements_text(historical_sales_data->'sales') AS sales_data FROM product_demand_forecast WHERE product_name LIKE '%Appliance%' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM Sales WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_id = 10;
SELECT date, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_id = 5;
SELECT product_id, sales_amount, date FROM Sales ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE product_id = 123 ORDER BY date DESC, sales_amount DESC
SELECT product_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM Sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 10000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT AVG(sales_amount) AS average_sales FROM Sales WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT date, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM Sales
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM Product;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Product ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Product GROUP BY category;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT trend_name, SUBSTR(trend_description, 1, 50) AS short_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE LENGTH(trend_description) > 100;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM Product ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT sale_date, SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM Sales GROUP BY sale_date;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category LIKE '%Clothing%';
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, forecast_amount FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_amount < 5000 AND product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics');
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing' OR category = 'Accessories' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT trend_category, COUNT(*) as trend_count FROM market_trends GROUP BY trend_category HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM product_catalog ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_catalog WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE price < 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM product_catalog WHERE stock_quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM product_catalog WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY category DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY price ASC, category ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM product_catalog WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM product_catalog GROUP BY category HAVING AVG(price) > 200 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
